Reviews.Title: works as it should
Reviews.Author: leamy
Reviews.Content: what can I say it actual works as it shouldthe manual sucks but this is the way it is with Chinese translationI tried the cheaper crap but It just suckedthe only issue I had was the learning curve with the menubut once I sat down and walked around and played with all the settings it made senseand worked as intendedif you are looking for a good middle of the road dvr this is the way to go

ProductInfo.Features:
H960 1080P High Resolution 960×480 8 Channels Video and Audio, Real Time   240FPS Recording and Display
Supports mobile device platforms iPhone, Andriod, BlackBerry, Windows   Mobile.
Hard Disk Driver is not included. Audio Microphone device is not included.
This DVR unit is CIB Security Exclusive with CIB brand name
One Year Warranty, full Technical Supports if Purchased Directly from USA   Security Store
ProductInfo.Name: CIB J960N08 960H HDMI High Resolution 8 CH Network Security Surveillance DVR
